summary: Implements a SeamlessM4T v2 based encoderâ€‘decoder model that converts textual input into unit representations for conditional generation tasks, handling weight sharing and providing standard forward computation along with accessors for its encoder, decoder and embedding layers.
business_intent: Enables applications that need to synthesize speech or generate audio units directly from text, supporting virtual assistants, content creation platforms, accessibility services, and other multimodal AI solutions.
